head.title: About Us
head.description: About Us - Phu Doan Trading Services Company

section1.badge: Orientation to develop a professional and sustainable Logistics service

section2.heading: A company with a wealth of experience with creativity and enthusiasm
section2.paragraph1: Established on January 20, 2020, PHU DOAN TRADING SERVICES CO., LTD officially went into operation and developed with a young team, graduated with a Master's degree, specialized engineers: Seaport operation, shipping economyâ€¦ has rich experience with creativity and enthusiasm in many fields.
section2.paragraph2: Up to now, the company has established a close relationship, trust, and long-term cooperation with many Agents, Shippers, Seaport service systems in Cai Mep - Thi Vai area, Ba Ria province - Vung Tau. With the orientation of developing a professional and sustainable Logistics service, The Company, along with a member company, TRUONG GIANG PHU MY CO., LTD always improve and apply science and technology in technological processes Exploiting and loading and unloading all kinds of goods, especially overloaded and oversized goods for works in Ba Ria - Vung Tau province.
section2.paragraph3: With professional development orientation, the company constantly innovates, optimizes, and improves quality service quality, in line with the increasing needs of partners, along with the goal of striving to become a strong company in the field of maritime support services. Focus on exploiting main services related to loading and unloading of general cargo, super-long and super-heavy cargo according to the plan: Ship - Vehicle, Vehicle - yard and vice versa, heavy industrial plants, road transport - navigation, cargo mooring, tally, provision of seaport and ship services.
